Update url in posts#new

Update file app/views/posts/new.html.erb

Change 

 <%= form_for :post do |f| %>

To 

 <%= form_for :post, url: posts_path do |f| %>

Becomes 

 <h1>New Post</h1>
 
 <%= form_for :post, url: posts_path do |f| %>
   <p>
     <%= f.label :title %><br>
     <%= f.text_field :title %>
